playground_heading: Over 90% of Fortune 100 companies and more than 150 million developers rely on GitHub to deliver scalable, reliable, and secure solutions for teams of all sizes.
playground_heading_emphasis: Over 90% of Fortune 100 companies and more than 150 million developers rely on GitHub
playground_heading_suffix: to deliver scalable, reliable, and secure solutions for teams of all sizes.
default_heading: Over 90% of Fortune 100 companies and more than 150 million developers use GitHub.
developer_first_description: Designed for developers, GitHub offers seamless collaboration tools that make teamwork smarter, faster, and more secure.
enterprise_grade_description: GitHub Enterprise scales with your organization, delivering the performance and security needed for teams of any size.
ai_powered_description: Leverage GitHub Copilot to automate tasks and enhance productivity with smart, context-aware code suggestions.
